typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTProduct
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		PName as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		color as string,
		StandardCost as integer,
		ListPrice as integer,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProduct
SalesLTProduct derive(CreatedHash = sha1(Name+Color+ProductNumber+Size)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimProduct exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimProduct lookup(SalesLTProduct@ProductID == DimProduct@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), (currentTimestamp()), (InsertedDate)),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		PName as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		color as string,
		StandardCost as integer,
		ListPrice as integer,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = SalesLTProduct@ProductID,
		PName = Name,
		ProductNumber = SalesLTProduct@ProductNumber,
		color = SalesLTProduct@Color,
		StandardCost = SalesLTProduct@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = SalesLTProduct@ListPrice,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
